title: Balala Xiao Mo Xian: Yao Xing Shouhu Zhe 2

synonyms: Balala Xiao Mo Xian: Yao Xing Shouhu Zhe 2nd Season
巴啦啦小魔仙之曜星守护者 第二季
alternative_titles.en: Balala the Fairies: Radiant Star Guardians 2nd Season
alternative_titles.ja: 巴啦啦小魔仙之曜星守护者2

synopsis:
A "dark veil" suddenly appears in the real world, prompting the little fairies to return to the Realm of Illusion to investigate. It turns out that the Realm of Illusion is being rebuilt, and Nightfall, along with her mysterious agents and the Dark Stars, has returned, attempting to dominate the magical world.

(Source: Douban, translated)
